tasks.label: Copy firmware to CIRCUITPY
tasks.command: cd firmware && ../mpy-cross.static -march=armv7m libs/taskManager.py && ../mpy-cross.static -march=armv7m libs/bluetooth.py && ../mpy-cross.static -march=armv7m libs/ui.py && cp code.py /run/media/mrtibbs/CIRCUITPY/ && cp libs/*.mpy /run/media/mrtibbs/CIRCUITPY/libs/
